TalentsTiers.Name: Deflection
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to parry by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Benediction
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of all instant cast spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Judgements
TalentsTiers.Description: Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spells by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Heart of the Crusader
TalentsTiers.Description: In addition to the normal effect, your Judgement spells will also increase the critical strike chance of all attacks made against that target by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Blessing of Might
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vindication
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives the Paladin's damaging attacks a chance to reduce the target's attackpower by [@value] for [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Conviction
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Seal of Command
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
Instant Cast
All melee auto attacks deal 62 to 64 additional Holy damage to the target and up to 2 additional targets. Lasts 30 min.

Unleasing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 145 to 146 Holy damage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Pursuit of Justice
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of all Disarm effects by [@value]% and increases movement and mounted movement speed by [@value2]%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Eye for an Eye
TalentsTiers.Description: All criticals against you cause [@value]% of the damage taken to the attacker as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed [@value2]% of the Paladin's total health.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sanctified Seals
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to critically hit with all spells and attacks by [@value]% and increases the damage caused by Exorcism and Crusader Strike by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Crusade
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all Holy and Physical damage caused by [@value]% and all damage caused against Humanoids, Demons, Undead and Elementals by an additional [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sanctified Retribution
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 50% and all damage caused by friendly targets affected by any of your Auras is increased by 3%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vengeance
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for [@value2] sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell or ability. This effect stacks up to [@value3] times.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Purpose
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces your chance to be hit by spells and ranged attacks by [@value2]% and gives your Hand of Freedom spell a [@value]% chance to remove any Stun effects on the target.

TalentsTiers.Name: The Art of War
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage of your Judgement, Crusader Strike and Divine Storm abilities by [@value]% and when one of those abilities or your normal attacks critically hit the cast time of your next Flash of Light or Exorcism [@value2]

TalentsTiers.Name: Repentance
TalentsTiers.Description:
7% of base mana
20 yd range

Instant Cast
1 min cooldown

Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 1 min. and removing the effect of Righteous Vengance. Any damage caused will awaken the target. Usable against Demons, Dragonkin, Giants, Humanoids and Undead.

TalentsTiers.Name: Judgements of the Wise
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Judgement spells have a [@value]% chance to grant the Replenishment effect to up to [@value2] party or raid members mana regeneration equal to [@value3]% of their maximum mana per [@value4] sec for [@value5] sec, and to immediately grant you [@value6]% of your base mana.

TalentsTiers.Name: Fanaticism
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of all Judgements capable of a critical hit by [@value]% and reduces threat caused by all actions by [@value2]% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sanctified Wrath
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Hammer of Wrath by [@value]%, reduces the cooldown of Avenging Wrath by [@value2] secs and while affected by Avenging Wrath [@value3]% of all damage caused bypasses damage reduction effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Swift Retribution
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Auras also increases casting, ranged and melee attack speeds by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Crusader Strike
TalentsTiers.Description:
4% of base mana
Melee range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

Requires Melee Weapon
An instant strike that causes 75% weapon damage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sheath of Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your bonus spell healing by an amount equal to [@value]% of your attack power and your critical healing spells heal the target for [@value2]% of the healed amount over [@value3] seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Righteous Vengeance
TalentsTiers.Description: When your Judgement, Cruader Strike and Divine Storm spells deal a critical strike, your target will take [@value]% additional damage over [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Storm
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
Melee range

Instant Cast
10 sec cooldown

Requires Melee Weapon
An instant weapon attack that causes 110% of weapon damage to up to 4 enemies within 8 yards. The Divine Storm heals up to 3 party or raid members totalling 25% of the damage caused.
